Ali_Zayn_al-Abidin_children.name: Muhammad al-Baqir
Ali_Zayn_al-Abidin_children.notes: Also known as Imam al-Baqir. He was the fifth Shia Imam.

Ali_Zayn_al-Abidin_children.name: Zayd ibn Ali
